General.Name: Grodno S.A.
General.Description: Grodno Spólka Akcyjna distributes electrotechnical and lighting products in Poland. The company also provides services in the field of audits, and electrical and lighting projects; execution and modernization of electrical and energy installations; and programming of building automation. It sells its products through a network of distributors and online stores. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Nieporet, Poland.
